hero.title: Hello! I'm Claudio Martín Herranz
hero.bio: Constant learning. Endless innovation. Purposeful designs — and a dash of passion. I craft adaptable, minimalist solutions… and I love every step of it.

about.introduction: Hi! I'm Claudio Martin, a web developer based in Barcelona with 20+ years of experience leading teams in hospitality. Technology is my passion, and during 2024 I completed a web development bootcamp at ITAcademy. I specialize in backend development with Node.js and databases like MongoDB and MySQL/PostgreSQL. I also have frontend skills in HTML & CSS, basic React & Angular, and UI design. Currently I'm working as a Support Engineer specialized in Microsoft Office 365 Security & Compliance.
